data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Free kick for Leicester in the half of Aston Villa.
In the minute 1, Throw-in for Aston Villa at King Power Stadium.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Ball safe as Aston Villa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Leicester in the half of Aston Villa.
Leicester's Ayoze Perez is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 8, Jon Moss signals a Aston Villa throw-in in Leicester's half.
Leicester needs to be cautious. Aston Villa have an attacking throw-in.
Jon Moss awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 11, In Leicester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Leicester are caught offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 14, Throw-in for Aston Villa in their own half.
Aston Villa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
In the minute 16, Can Aston Villa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leicester's half?
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
Throw-in Leicester.
In the minute 18, Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leicester are whistled for offside.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Aston Villa.
In the minute 22, Leicester's Dennis Praet gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Aston Villa defender.
Leicester have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Kelechi Iheanacho for Leicester drives towards goal at King Power Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 24, Jon Moss awards the away team a throw-in.
Trezeguet for Aston Villa gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Leicester at King Power Stadium.
In the minute 29, Leicester to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
Free kick Leicester.
In the minute 31, Aston Villa have a goal kick.
In Leicester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ayoze Perez (Leicester) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 32, Jon Moss signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
John McGinn for Aston Villa has been booked by Jon Moss and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for Aston Villa in the half of Leicester.
In the minute 34, It's a goal kick for the away team in Leicester.
Free kick for Aston Villa in their own half.
Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
Free kick Leicester.
In the minute 40, Jon Moss signals a free kick to Leicester.
Matty Cash is booked for the away team.
Free kick in a good position for Aston Villa!
In the minute 41, Youri Tielemans (Leicester) has received a first yellow card.
Aston Villa are pushing forward but Matt Targett's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Leicester goal kick.
In the minute 43, Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Leicester get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Aston Villa's half?
Throw-in for Leicester in the half of Aston Villa.
In the minute 44, Jon Moss signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
Throw-in Leicester.
Aston Villa push upfield but Jon Moss quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Jon Moss signals a Aston Villa throw-in in Leicester's half.
Aston Villa to take a throw-in in Leicester territory.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
Jon Moss blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at King Power Stadium.
In the minute 46, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick Leicester.
Leicester push forward at King Power Stadium and Ayoze Perez gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Aston Villa defence.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Leicester.
Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Leicester in their own half.
In the minute 50, Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Can Aston Villa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leicester's half?
Aston Villa have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 52, In Leicester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Aston Villa's John McGinn gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
In the minute 54, Aston Villa attack but Ezri Konsa's header doesn't find the target.
Jon Moss awards Leicester a goal kick.
Aston Villa awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 55, Ball safe as Leicester is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Leicester in their own half.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Leicester at King Power Stadium.
Leicester awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jon Moss signals a Leicester throw-in in Aston Villa's half.
In the minute 58, Jon Moss signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
Youri Tielemans gets his shot on target but fails to score for Leicester.
In the minute 61, Throw-in for Aston Villa close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leicester.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Leicester just outside Aston Villa's area.
In the minute 64, Leicester drives forward and Youri Tielemans gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Throw-in high up the field for Leicester in Leicester.
In the minute 67, Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Jon Moss signals a throw-in for Aston Villa, close to Leicester's area.
Brendan Rodgers is making the team's first substitution at King Power Stadium with James Maddison replacing Dennis Praet.
Corner awarded to Aston Villa.
In the minute 69, Douglas Luiz of Aston Villa smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Aston Villa pushes forward through Ollie Watkins, whose finish on goal is saved.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Leicester close to the penalty box.
In the minute 70, Douglas Luiz (Aston Villa) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Islam Slimani is replacing Kelechi Iheanacho for Leicester at King Power Stadium.
In Leicester, James Maddison of Leicester is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 73, Free kick for Aston Villa in the half of Leicester.
Timothy Castagne (Leicester) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Leicester to take a throw-in in Aston Villa territory.
In the minute 74, Jon Moss signals a free kick to Aston Villa.
Leicester's Jonny Evans has been booked in Leicester.
Free kick Leicester.
In the minute 78, Leicester's Harvey Barnes misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Aston Villa at King Power Stadium.
The home team have replaced Nampalys Mendy with Hamza Choudhury. This is the third substitution made today by Brendan Rodgers.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Leicester in the half of Aston Villa.
Important block from the Aston Villa defence as Ayoze Perez fires in a strike for Leicester.
Leicester surge into the attack at King Power Stadium but Islam Slimaniâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 80, Ball goes out of play for a Aston Villa goal kick.
Bertrand Traore is on a sub for Trezeguet for Aston Villa.
In Leicester, Harvey Barnes of Leicester is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 83, Aston Villa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Aston Villa in the half of Leicester.
Leicester awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 85, Aston Villa's Ollie Watkins is whistled for offside at King Power Stadium.
Aston Villa have been awarded a corner by Jon Moss.
Important block from the Leicester defence as Matt Targett fires in a strike for Aston Villa.
In the minute 88, Aston Villa push forward at King Power Stadium and Ross Barkley gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Leicester defence.
Aston Villa drive forward but Ollie Watkins is judged offside.
Jon Moss awards Aston Villa a goal kick.
Bertrand Traore (Aston Villa) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Leicester defenders.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Leicester in their own half.
Jon Moss signals a free kick to Aston Villa in their own half.
That's full-time at King Power Stadium. The final score is 0-1.
Goal! Aston Villa have got their heads in front thanks to a Ross Barkley strike.
John McGinn with an assist there.
